item.title: Resident Evil: Revelations 2
item.dc:creator: Sybill
item.description:
Really RE Revelations 2 is very different from the first part. RE Revelations 1 was more like a TV Show, I liked the argument, but this game is not a survival horror, only a “Survival”. Perhaps RE Revelations 2 is diferent, the game is scary, When i played i saw slow scenes, strategy. “Natalia” gave a different air to the game, the end was… wow…
What about Natalia?.. Mmm
But there were many things I did not like, some scenes… hunt rabbits and others details.
The end of the game helps to finish with grace.

Read full topic

item.title: Resident Evil: Revelations 2
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
Resident Evil Revelations 2 Removes Features From PC Version

The PC version of the recently released Resident Evil: Revelations 2 will not include an offline cooperative mode despite that feature being listed on the game’s Steam store page earlier, publisher Capcom has confirmed.

At the time of writing, the description of features in the game still says that players will be able to “overcome the nightmares in either single player mode with an AI partner or offline co-op,” but also says at the bottom of the page that the “PC version does not support offline co-op play in the Campaign or Raid Mode.”

“The decision to prioritise a single local screen was made to ensure a stable user experience across a variety of different PC settings and devices,” Capcom said in a statement. “Raid mode will support online co-op shortly after launch when a free patch is available for players to download which adds this feature, but the main campaign on PC will only be available to play in single local screen.”

https://www.gamespot.com/articles/resident-evil-revelations-2-removes-features-from-/1100-6425529/

Read full topic

item.title: Resident Evil: Revelations 2
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Depending on how long the full game package takes to come out after the episodes, it might be much more worth it to just wait for it.

I mean, spacing the episodes by a week just seems odd, there’s just no time to act on player feedback. Why not just take whatever extra time they might need and release the whole thing?

Read full topic

Maxey:

Oh yeah? Well, my dad works for Bethesda and he said The Evil Within will have more mega p’s per scare inch than ResiRev2, so there!

Whurs ur source 4 dis u hav no prooof

On topic: I like the look of things so far, but it’s too early for me to get hyped at all.

item.title: Resident Evil: Revelations 2
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Oh yeah? Well, my dad works for Bethesda and he said The Evil Within will have more mega p’s per scare inch than ResiRev2, so there!

Seriously tho, I think both games will be great but you just can’t deny the higher pedigree and production values behind TEW. Mikami has worked on some of the best games in their genre and the latest impressions on Evil Within are showering the game with praise.

Read full topic
